alert.note: Alert for Bossier; Caddo (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 16 at 1:49PM CDT until July 16 at 2:15PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Caddo Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Southwestern Bossier Parish in northwestern Louisiana... * Until 215 PM CDT. * At 148 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Shreveport, moving east northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Shreveport, Bossier City, Fosters, Ferguson, Cross Lake, Forbing, Sligo and Barksdale Air Force Base. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
